Instant redirects that don't break the flow.
See clicks, countries, and devices without noise.

manifesto.p1: You post content. People visit your bio. And then... you lose the trail.
manifesto.p2: You see clicks, but you don't understand decisions. You don't know which link they chose. You don't know what they ignored. You don't know why they stopped tapping.
manifesto.p3: Likes are not intention. Visits are not context. And a pretty bio doesn't explain real behavior.
manifesto.p4: Most link-in-bios just show links. Fezlink shows what happens after the click.
manifesto.p5: Every interaction leaves a signal. Some are seen immediately. Others appear when you start looking seriously.
manifesto.p6: Fezlink organizes those signals, measures them, and turns them into clear insights, so you stop guessing and start deciding.
manifesto.p7: We don't chase vanity metrics. We seek useful information: the kind that allows you to adjust, improve, and choose wisely.
manifesto.p8: Fezlink isn't for those who just want to 'put links'. It's for those who want to understand their audience and take action with real data.
